alert.note: Alert for Reno (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 2:32AM CDT until June 10 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN RENO AND CENTRAL SEDGWICK COUNTIES... At 232 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Park City to near Garden Plain, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Haysville, Park City, Valley Center, Goddard, Maize, Cheney, Colwich, Garden Plain, Downtown Wichita, Andale, Eastborough, West Wichita, East Wichita, Eisenhower National Airport, Mcconnell Air Force Base, South Wichita, Cheney Lake and Oaklawn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
